about-paragraph: I'm a frontend-leaning Applied Informatics student who loves building useful websites, polishing UX, and self-hosting projects.
fun-fact: My home server is named bebop :D
experience.work.1.title: IT Technician
experience.work.1.desc: Providing IT support and system administration within the company, including server configuration and resolving technical issues for users.
experience.work.2.title: Match Day Director
experience.work.2.desc: Managing the main LED screen and sound system on the stadium, started as a cameraman / instant replay maker.
experience.work.3.title: Frontend Developer
experience.work.3.desc: Modifications and improvements to the web map application, team communication, and design of new components for the user interface.
experience.work.4.title: Copywriter
experience.work.4.desc: Writing articles and investment analyses, editing texts, working with WordPress.
experience.soft.communication.proof: Match day coordination with AV crew; clear comms running stadium LED + sound under time pressure.
experience.soft.problem-solving.proof: Small automations to cut repetitive tasks and reduce ticket time.
experience.soft.teamwork.proof: Cross-role collaboration (tech support, AV ops, editors) to keep events and services running.
experience.soft.empathy.proof: Support for students/staff with varying tech levels; tailored guidance and calm troubleshooting.
experience.soft.focus.proof: Built self-hosted tools; long deep-work sessions to ship useful utilities.
experience.soft.adaptability.proof: Switched between roles as needs changed; learned on the fly.
